title: American Horror Story Season 10: Early Predictions & Theories
author: GameSpot Universe
comment: What's your favorite prediction for Season 10 of American Horror Story?
I want a marine season, with the cruise ship maybe being haunted and evil killer mermaid/sirens and some murder mystery involved with them and the ship. Would love that so much.
I would LOVE to see Taissa be portrayed as a villain. It’ll give her a break from the good girl roles (I.e. violet, zoe, the girl from Roanoke)
I’ve been wanting a season called ‘Titanic’ or ‘Alcatraz’ because we’ve never seen a boat or prison setting on AHS.
Evan Peters has always wanted a space theme, so a continuation of Kit Walker's story would be awesome!
description:
Asylum Aliens? Coven Witches? Urban Legends? AHS: 1984 is over but we're already looking ahead at Season 10 of American Horror Story. 

Ryan Murphy spoke with TV Guide (
